name: Hawaij (Yemenite Spice Blend)
keywords: black pepper, cumin, turmeric, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: In a black iron or heavy-bottomed skillet combine the cumin, cardamom, turmeric and coriander. Place over very low heat and toast, stirring constantly, for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, add the black pepper and stir well. Store the blend in a tightly sealed container for up to one month.
Rub hawaij liberally into fish, chicken, lamb, pork or beef one hour before cooking.
